content: Hi, i am sellling hour boosted steam CS:GO accounts, they have 20.000+ hours. registered before 2.6 years.https://imgur.com/a/DuKZaM5The accounts were opened by me, they are not accounts bought/sold from other places.CS:GO has not been used in any way other than increasing the game time.The country of accounts is Turkey, you can change it.No information has been changed since the accounts were opened.The first e-mail address used when opening the accounts will be delivered with access. Access to the first mail is done through Yandex Mail, the domain name is @lodgegaming.xyz.Every information of the account, including the password of the first e-mail, can be changed, the account will be entirely yours.Clock trimming was done by me on machines with Turkish IP, no foreign services were used.Account names and email addresses are generated from random English words/names.Accounts do not have CS:GO Prime upgrades. It can be purchased in-game.No phone number has been added to the accounts, no purchase has been made.They are clean and high game hour accounts that you won't find anywhere else.Price per account $25, accepting cryptocurrency and escrow. ( buyer paying fees )No refunds after purchase.These accounts have been boosted for 20,000 hours. They did not get vac banned and it is not possible to get it.If you get a vac ban after purchase, it is entirely at your own risk.Don't use cheats.Contact for bulk sale.Discord Remus#9263
